HediffDef.label: ritual night trance
HediffDef.description: This pawn enters a focused trance state after sunset, guided by ancestral instincts honed through generations of night raids. Their movements are sharper, aim steadier, and awareness heightened until dawn.

HediffDef.label: ritual flesh empowerment
HediffDef.description: Having consumed sacred humanlike flesh during a ritual, this pawn is momentarily empowered by ancestral energy. Their presence is more commanding and their aura intensified.
